channel.title: Euro-Scape
channel.description:
Euro-Scape
About
Euro-Scape is being made for the pvp part of runescape and also the ecomany.
lately ive been putting my server to test so far the best results are 3 weeks of uptime and no lagg issues it is hosted on a 12 gb ram dedicated server (core i7).
Source: RiotScape
Developers:
* Steven aka me
[CENTER]Features
Green = Complete Orange = Under development Red = Not yet started
Euro-Scape Features
[COLOR="Lime"]* Database - Handler o Full Player Loading Via Mysql o Full Player Saving Via Mysql[/COLOR] [COLOR="DarkOrange"]o Mysql Clan Chat[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"] o Mysql Npc Spawns o Mysql Npc Emotes[/COLOR] [COLOR="DarkOrange"] o Mysql Npc Drops[/COLOR] * Skills [COLOR="Lime"] o Woodcutting - Coded in python o Mining - Coded in python o Agility o Comabt Skills o Prayer[/COLOR] * Items Ect [COLOR="Lime"] o Custom Coded Random Drop System[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"] o Adding 474 Items[/COLOR] * Minigames [COLOR="Lime"] o Dueling o Barrows - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc[/url] o StayAlive - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4[/url] (its like 50x better now) o TeamPK[/COLOR] [COLOR="DarkOrange"] o Fight Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"] o Fight Pits o Assault o Pest Control o Clan Wars[/COLOR] * Quests [COLOR="Red"] o Monkey Madness o Desert Tresure o Lost City o Dwaf Cannon[/COLOR] * Combat [COLOR="DarkOrange"] o Pvp - 60% - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ[/url] o PvN - 70% o Magic - 80% - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc[/url] o Range - 70%[/COLOR][/CENTER] Media. [QUOTE] Videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4[/url]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ppez5y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ytxjwm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/24eni36.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11udn3d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/otgcgw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35btcg1.png[/img] [/QUOTE] want to join? Name ? Age ? How I Can Contact You ? What Part Will You Play (Server Coder, Client Coder, Website Coder(im the only one :p, Beta Tester) ? How Often Are You Online ? What Is You Expierance In Coding ? Have You Got Any Proof ?

item.title: Euro-Scape
item.dc:creator: @pkin3 pkin3
item.description:
@pkin3 wrote:

Euro-Scape

About

Euro-Scape is being made for the pvp part of runescape and also the ecomany.

lately ive been putting my server to test so far the best results are 3 weeks of uptime and no lagg issues it is hosted on a 12 gb ram dedicated server (core i7).

Source: RiotScape

Developers:

* Steven aka me

[CENTER]Features

Green = Complete
Orange = Under development
Red = Not yet started

Euro-Scape Features

[COLOR=“Lime”]* Database - Handler
o Full Player Loading Via Mysql
o Full Player Saving Via Mysql[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“DarkOrange”]o Mysql Clan Chat[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“Lime”] o Mysql Npc Spawns
o Mysql Npc Emotes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“DarkOrange”] o Mysql Npc Drops[/COLOR]
* Skills
[COLOR=“Lime”] o Woodcutting - Coded in python
o Mining - Coded in python
o Agility
o Comabt Skills
o Prayer[/COLOR]
* Items Ect
[COLOR=“Lime”] o Custom Coded Random Drop System[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“Red”] o Adding 474 Items[/COLOR]
* Minigames
[COLOR=“Lime”] o Dueling
o Barrows - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc
o StayAlive - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tPWQqFHU6w4 (its like 50x better now)
o TeamPK[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“DarkOrange”] o Fight Caves[/COLOR]
[COLOR=“Red”] o Fight Pits
o Assault
o Pest Control
o Clan Wars[/COLOR]
* Quests
[COLOR=“Red”] o Monkey Madness
o Desert Tresure
o Lost City
o Dwaf Cannon[/COLOR]
* Combat
[COLOR=“DarkOrange”] o Pvp - 60% - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40q2wEyDNhQ
o PvN - 70%
o Magic - 80% - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhWTpcoGYLc
o Range - 70%[/COLOR][/CENTER]
Media.
